mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_model (model_name, model_type, model_path, accuracy, description, input_features, output_features, creator_id, is_public, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{modelName}, #{modelType}, #{modelPath}, #{accuracy}, #{description}, #{inputFeatures}, #{outputFeatures}, #{creatorId}, #{isPublic}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_model SET model_name = #{modelName}, model_type = #{modelType}, model_path = #{modelPath}, accuracy = #{accuracy}, description = #{description}, input_features = #{inputFeatures}, output_features = #{outputFeatures}, is_public = #{isPublic}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_model ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_model WHERE model_type = #{modelType} AND status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_model WHERE is_public = 1 AND status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_model WHERE creator_id = #{creatorId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
